item.title: [PIG-4468] Pig's jackson version conflicts with that of hadoop 2.6.0 or newer
item.description:
Pig use jackson of 1.8.8 while hadoop 2.6.0 use 1.9.13. And hadoop 2.6.0 use one of ObjectMapper's new method setSerializationInclusion which is not existed in jackson 1.8.8. It would cause the following issue

comments.comment:
Few comments:

  • Can you check if hadoop 1.x compiles and runs fine?
  • Can you update TestRegisteredJarVisibility.testRegisterJarOverridePigJarPackages test and jackson-pig-3039-test.version=1.9.9 to use a newer version of jackson (2.x) ?

I found this issue on HDP 2.3(HDP-2.3.2.0-2950).

My workaround is to remove the followings from pig classpath so that relevant newer jars are loaded from hadoop classpaths.

rw-rr- 1 root root 227500 Jul 14 23:11 jackson-core-asl-1.8.8.jar
